title: Self-Directed English Learning Module Design for Engineering Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental engineering terminology and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Learners are mathematically literate citizens who need the ability to analyze and present materials in English within engineering contexts

learning_goals: Learners can independently analyze one engineering field English research paper and summarize its core concepts.
Learners can express opinions on engineering-related topics in online discussions with peers using Zoom-based collaborative tools with over 80% accuracy
Learners can develop a self-directed learning plan based on the ADDIE model and access online learning modules with over 90% participation rate for four weeks

resources: Engineering field English research paper database

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
